name: test_e2e_with_logs[609_API_IDOR_002]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `API_IDOR_002` |
| **Name** | IDOR Invoice v2 Enumeration |
| **Category** | API_SECURITY |
| **Subcategory** | idor |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `/api/v2/orders/12345/invoice`
